amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Army to close the United States Army School of the Americas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 106-624 to repeal the authority for the School of Americas and to authorize a Congressional task force to critically assess training of Latin American soldiers by the U.S. and report its findings to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moakley amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 214 (Roll no. 204).
